name: echoflak
description: EchoFlak is a specialized tool designed for War Thunder enthusiasts and content creators facing issues with NVIDIA Highlights' auto-capture feature, particularly for aircraft death scenes. This Node.js package provides an automated solution to identify, manage, and eliminate duplicate video clips generated by the NVIDIA Highlights feature, ensuring a cleaner, more organized collection of gameplay moments. With its unique approach to processing and deduplicating video content, EchoFlak streamlines video management, saving time and storage space, while enhancing the quality of your War Thunder video archives. Whether you're compiling highlight reels or maintaining an orderly video library, EchoFlak offers a robust, game-specific fix to common video duplication challenges.
author: osistlk
